headline: Can Lower Interest Rates Amplify VST Stock's Growth Strategy?
summary: VST's growth strategy gains traction as falling interest rates lower costs and boost demand for clean power.

headline: Billionaire David Tepper Sells These 5 Stocks to Buy This 1 Stock
summary: David Tepper is one of the most successful hedge fund managers in history, with a net worth of ~$23.7 billion. He’s been selling UnitedHealth (NYSE:UNH), Intel (NASDAQ:INTC), Alibaba (NYSE:BABA), Vistra (NYSE:VST), and Micron (NASDAQ:MU). He’s piling into a lesser-known stock instead called Whirlpool (NYSE:WHR), and we’ll look into why in a bit. Tepper is the ... Billionaire David Tepper Sells These 5 Stocks to Buy This 1 Stock

headline: Biggest US Power Auction Set to Deepen Affordability Concerns
summary: The results due late Wednesday will confirm what PJM Interconnection LLC — the nation’s largest grid operator, serving millions of Americans from Chicago to Washington, DC — will pay power generators to secure capacity starting in 2027.  The bill is expected to reach $17 billion, according to a Bloomberg survey of grid experts, policymakers and traders.  Surging utility bills are already shaping up to be an issue in the congressional midterm elections next year: Despite President Donald Trump saying electricity prices would be halved within a year of taking office, costs have increased.

headline: IDU: Utilities Dashboard For December
summary: Water utilities are undervalued by 18% vs. 11-year averages, while electricity/multi-utilities and gas utilities are slightly overvalued. Learn more about IDU here.

headline: Talen Energy: An Aggressive Electricity Price Play
summary: Talen Energy maintains lower hedge ratios than peers, amplifying upside from AI-driven demand, electrification, and renewable constraints. See why TLN stock is a Buy.
